opinion.remarks: ;He is using TIMOLET eye drops for BEs'. Should he continue?
opinion.completion_remarks: ;IOP within normal limits , but has enlarged CDR with NRR slope, and requires frequent Intravitreal steroids for DME; treat as glaucoma suspect, continue timolol once, and monitor IOP every visit; we can plan HFA BE next visit
